name: Super Soccer
overview: Shoot, pass, dribble and score! Super Soccer offers the gut-wrenching intensity and fast action of international soccer competition. You guide one of 16 top teams from every corner of the globe in exhibition or tournament play. With precise play control and super realistic field level view, you'll experience all the power of offense and the pressure of defense. Fullback, Midfielder, Striker or Goalie - you control the man on the ball so the excitement never stops! Play a single exhibition game or compete for the World Championship in a fast-paced, multi-game tournament. Challenge the Super NES alone or with a friend. Or, take on an opponent in head-to-head play. If the game ends in a tie, face the ultimate challenge of the Shoot-out, where failure means instant defeat and success means final victory!
